results.title: Amlodipine as a Suggested Cause of Yellow Nail Syndrome: A Case Report
results.text_hl: After two months, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ was restarted externally, and the @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@dyspnea@@@ relapsed.

results.title: Calcium Channel Blocker Overdose Causes Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome and Acute Kidney Injury in a 15-Year-Old Female
results.text_hl: Lastly, treatment methods such as hemodialysis and other filtration methods are ineffective due to @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@'s lipophilicity and significant protein binding capacity.

results.title: The effect of amlodipine on respiratory and pulmonary vascular responses to hypoxia in mountaineers.
results.text_hl: During exercise, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ increased @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@breathlessness@@@, measured using standard scales, in both normoxia and @DISEASE_Hypoxia @DISEASE_MESH:D000860 @@@hypoxia@@@ but had no effect on ventilatory variables.

citations.NLM: Watt M, Peacock AJ, Newell J, McDonagh T, Grant S. The effect of amlodipine on respiratory and pulmonary vascular responses to hypoxia in mountaineers. Eur Respir J. 2000 Mar;15(3):459-63. PMID: 10759437

results.title: Life-threatening calcium channel blocker overdose and its management.
results.text_hl: A young @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ presented to the emergency department with complaints of @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@, @DISEASE_Abdomen_Acute @DISEASE_MESH:D000006 @@@pain in the abdomen@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@difficulty in breathing@@@ after ingestion of 56 tablets of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ 5 mg each (total 280 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@).

citations.NLM: Rizvi I, Ahmad A, Gupta A, Zaman S. Life-threatening calcium channel blocker overdose and its management. BMJ Case Rep. 2012 May 30;2012():. PMID: 22669854
citations.BibTeX: @article{22669854, title={Life-threatening calcium channel blocker overdose and its management.}, author={Rizvi I and Ahmad A and Gupta A and Zaman S}, journal={BMJ Case Rep}, volume={2012}}

results.title: Effect of amlodipine on norepinephrine kinetics and baroreflex function in patients with congestive heart failure.
results.text_hl: One subject who tolerated head-down tilt coupled with @CHEMICAL_Phenylephrine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010656 @@@phenylephrine@@@ administration during the control and placebo tests became markedly @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@short of breath@@@ during the same intervention after @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ administration.

citations.NLM: Goldsmith SR. Effect of amlodipine on norepinephrine kinetics and baroreflex function in patients with congestive heart failure. Am Heart J. 1997 Jul;134(1):13-9. PMID: 9266778
